Review Text: Like most of these product it is a tad fussy and messy. Practice definitely makes perfect and less is more. the dark brown color is pretty good. If you sprinkle it too thickly it looks artificial. It does give the appearance of fuller hair and masks bare scalp to some extent. the fibers need hair to adhere to so it will be of  no use to those who are bald. I tried it without any spray or holding solution. It adhered fine. The dry particles do brush off without staining. It doesn't run down your face if you sweat but removes easily with shampoo. There is definitely a learning curve to application and it is important to get a close match to your natural color. 3.5

{'Color': 'Dark Blonde 61', 'Brand': 'REVLON', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Full Cure Time': '10 Minutes', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 2.7 x 2.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2446-61', 'UPC': '309972446619 885222320156', 'Manufacturer': 'Revlon'}
As usual my hairdresser left me in the lurch and cancelled my touch up.  I was not happy as I was leaving for a trip with some important meetings the next day.  I could live without the cut but not the roots.  In desperation I purchased this product and boy was I pleased. The kit comes with directions, the usual skimpy gloves, a small bottle of color and activator.  It mixes easily.  The sponge applicator provides good control.  The product sits for ten minutes (fifteen if you have hard to color hair or alot of gray), rinse out, shampoo and style. Initially I was concerned that the color was too dark but it was great, blended beautifully with my expensive salon color.  It looked as good as what I get at the salon and without the attitude and expense. Recommended.

this leave in conditioner is easy to use. sprayed on damp hair, it is an effective detangler. sprayed on both dry and damp hair, it does provide some softness and moisture to dry, over processed hair. My hair is fine and color treated and is frequently subjected to heat from dryers and curling irons. This did leave it feeling soft and looking healthy. However it didn't do much to refresh my style and the fragrance is strong. It is not an unpleasant aroma, sweet like baby powder and light musk, but not my favorite. It is strong and it lasts all day. The bottle tucks easily into a bag or briefcase and the spray functions smoothly. I wish it either had a difference scent or was fragrance free. I appreciate the exclusion of mineral oil, petrolaltum or artificial coloring. It is an effective product that provides relief to stressed locks.

**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** Strong preference for at-home solutions, particularly for root touch-ups, gray coverage, and effective leave-in conditioners for maintaining hair health. Recently showed interest in products that enhance the appearance of hair density.
- **Product Quality:** Values high-quality results matching salon treatments without the costs or appointments, appreciating products that repair damage, restore softness, and enhance volume.
- **Ease of Use:** Prefers easy-to-apply products with controls that enhance application, such as spray and sponge applicators. Experience with hair enhancing products highlights the need for careful application to achieve natural-looking results.
- **Time Efficiency:** Looks for quick processing times, favoring products with noticeable results in minimal time (e.g., 10-15 minutes for color).
- **Color Matching:** Ensures at-home colors blend well with previously applied dyes, focusing on achieving a natural look.
- **Practicality Over Luxury:** Prioritizes functionality and effectiveness over brand prestige. Satisfied with product performance despite minor imperfections, such as application challenges or fragrance strength.
- **User Experience:** Positive past experiences drive repeat purchases and recommendations, particularly for color maintenance and damage restoration. Acknowledges the learning curve with new products while appreciating effective results for both color-treated and damaged hair.

The user continually seeks natural ingredient solutions that balance hair health with aesthetic needs, demonstrating a thoughtful approach to personal care.
